description:
It's just the start of the maze.
You have only one way to go.
Which path your friend should take ?
Press 's' to go straight

Right or Left ? What do we do now ?
Press 'l' to go left
Press 'r' to go right

Hmmm... A bifurcation.
Press 'l' to go left
Press 'r' to go right

I'm hearing some voices here. Hurry up!
Press 'l' to go left
Press 'r' to go right

Something is following me...
Press 'l' to go left
Press 'r' to go right

I think we are almost there.
Press 'l' to go left
Press 'r' to go right

It's getting closer... HELP!
Press 'l' to go left
Press 's' to go straight
Press 'r' to go right

I can feel it...
Press 'l' to go left
Press 's' to go straight
Press 'r' to go right
